scripts.github:release: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.github:commit-changelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.changelog:major: npm run changelog:clean && changelog -M && npm run github:commit-changelog
scripts.changelog:minor: npm run changelog:clean && changelog -m && npm run github:commit-changelog
scripts.changelog:patch: npm run changelog:clean && changelog -p && npm run github:commit-changelog
scripts.release:major: npm run changelog:major && npm version major && npm run github:release && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run changelog:minor && npm version minor && npm run github:release && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run changelog:patch && npm version patch && npm run github:release && npm run build && npm publish
